attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scots students do not pay tution fees but english students studying in Scotland do. This is unfair considering we all pay tax to the same government either we are one country or we are not I petition that on matters of education we are considered equal in the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: Please change the Title of your petition from a name to an action for HM Government.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
